title: My new playlist!
content: This playlist is a collection of all of my favorite Beyonce songs!

title: Queen of Comebacks!
content: Demi Lovato has really come a long way since her Camp Rock days. I love her new sound in her album HOLY FVCK and I really love her rerecording of Heartattack

title: Sick Beat
content: This is one of my favorite KKB songs! When they say 'whether you're a boy or a girl or a super computer' I was just like yas non-binary rights!

title: But is it Disco?
content: I can't believe Kylie Minogue invented Disco with this album in 2020
